title: Ottoman and Mughal Images Gunpowder MCQ 2

content.question: The two dynasties whose expansions are illustrated by the images shared which of the following?

choices.label: Their rulers claimed to be descended from the Mongol ruling family of Chinggis Khan
Their rulers were recognized as caliphs by most Muslims
Their rulers were descended from Turkic peoples of Central Asian descent
Their rulers claimed power by virtue of protecting Dar al-Islam from European invasion

content.answer: Their rulers were descended from Turkic peoples of Central Asian descent

topic.text: 1.2: Developments in Dar al-Islam from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
